install.name: krahSTek PNG Logo
install.author: theshark
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 krahSTek, LLC. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module allows the use of PNG logos, including in IE

param.name: filename
param.label: Logo Image Filename
param.description: The name of the file for the PNG logo.

param.name: alt
param.label: Image alt text
param.description: The text to use for the image alt tag

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
